original_text: But if ye will not obey the voice of the Lord, but rebel against the commandment of the Lord, then shall the hand of the Lord be against you, as it was against your fathers.
korean_text: 너희가 만일 여호와의 목소리를 듣지 아니하고 여호와의 명령을 거역하면 여호와의 손이 너희의 조상들을 치신 것 같이 너희를 치실 것이라

sentences.original_text: But if ye will not obey the voice of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 너희가 주의 목소리에 순종하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: but rebel against the commandment of the Lord
then shall the hand of the Lord be against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 주의 손이 너희를 대적할 것이며

sentences.original_text: as it was against your fathers
